DESC.PARA: The spectrum from an accretion disk, where the opacities are dominated by free-free absorption, i.e. the so-called blackbody disk model. Not correct for a disk around a neutron star.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: neutron star mass in solar mass units
inner disk radius in gravitational (= 3 * Schwarzschild) radii; do not change this from 1
2 cos(i)/d^2, where i is the inclination of the disk and d is the distance in units of 10 kpc

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.
